WarnOnEmptyTrash.title: Show warning before emptying the Trash
WarnOnEmptyTrash.description: Warning message requiring user approval before emptying the Trash.

ProhibitGoToFolder.title: Prohibit Go to Folder
ProhibitGoToFolder.description: Allows user to open files or folders by typing a pathname.

ProhibitConnectTo.title: Prohibit Connect to Server
ProhibitConnectTo.description: Opens a dialog box for finding servers on the network.

InterfaceLevel.title: Finder Interface Level
InterfaceLevel.description: Select if the standard (Full) or (Simple) Finder should be used.

ShowMountedServersOnDesktop.title: Show Connected Servers on the Desktop
ShowMountedServersOnDesktop.description: Show connected servers on the desktop.

ProhibitBurn.title: Prohibit Burn Disc
ProhibitBurn.description: Writes permanent information to a CD or DVD. Disc burning restrictions require both Disc Burning and Finder payloads.

ShowHardDrivesOnDesktop.title: Show Internal Hard Drives on the Desktop
ShowHardDrivesOnDesktop.description: Show hard disks on the desktop.

ShowExternalHardDrivesOnDesktop.title: Show External disks
ShowExternalHardDrivesOnDesktop.description: Show External Hard Drives on the Desktop.

ProhibitEject.title: Prohibit Eject
ProhibitEject.description: Ejects removable media and mountable volumes.

ShowRemovableMediaOnDesktop.title: Show Removable media (CDs, DVDs, etc.) on the Desktop
ShowRemovableMediaOnDesktop.description: Show removable media on the desktop.
